name: Escaping Square - Download Version
description:
A short game about a square that doesn't want to become a platform. This is the download version of Escaping Square. For the web player version, see 'Escaping Square - Web Player'. The link is:
https://shaun-d-white.itch.io/escaping-square

Gameplay Information:
- 3D autorunner with prodecually (randomly) generated platforms.
- Jump from platform to platform
- Numeroues goals to achieve
- Numeroues modifiers to change how you play

Controls:
Press the 'jump' button to jump
